attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Despite the clear economic and social benefits of a thriving savings culture, savers have been persistently ignored in their efforts to provide for the future and the UK now faces a worsening savings crisis. The frenzy of spending and borrowing that was a major factor in the collapse of UK banking has hit prudent savers hardest and there is an urgent need to create policies that support saving in the UK.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to take identifiable and specific measures which will benefit savers and pension funds, thereby encouraging a culture of saving rather than borrowing in the UK.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=save-our-savers


Her Majesty's Government
